key.name: button-position
key.description: Position where the home button will be placed in the top panel

key.name: animation-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds between minimizing each window for smoother animation

key.name: show-count-in-tooltip
key.description: Whether to show the number of minimized windows in the button tooltip

key.name: include-all-workspaces
key.description: When true, minimizes/restores windows from all workspaces instead of just the current one

key.name: exclude-always-on-top
key.description: Whether to exclude always-on-top windows from minimization

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the icon in the panel, in pixels.

key.name: icon-path
key.description: Can be a symbolic icon name from the current theme (e.g., 'user-home-symbolic') or an absolute path to an image file.
